name: multiple_desktop_grids
description:
The user can click and go to the next / previous screen (desktop) if the user has setup more
than 1 home screen
pre_condition: Have multiple screens. Example: open an application like gnome-terminal or calculator, move the application to another workspace (right-click on window title, "move to workspace down").

steps.expected: the display must switch to next desktop
the display must switch to initial desktop
